data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 825,900 people living in East Khasi Hills through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of East Khasi Hills, Meghalaya, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in East Khasi Hills, Meghalaya, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of East Khasi Hills, Meghalaya, India.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, help the 9,085 believers in East Khasi Hills to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 816,815 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord, please remember the Hajang Banai people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, please convict each believer in East Khasi Hills, Meghalaya, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 816,815 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, help the 9,085 believers in East Khasi Hills to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in East Khasi Hills, Meghalaya, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

location.name: East Khasi Hills
location.people_groups_list: Hajang, Koch (Hindu traditions), Koch (Muslim traditions), Halam, Bhunar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Hajang (74,000), Koch (Hindu traditions) (50,000), Koch (Muslim traditions) (400), Halam (42,000), Bhunar (200)
